title: Hive Growler Bar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Plenty of beers on tap plus wine, cocktails, and unusual soft drinks. Food choices are reportedly progressive by Augusta standards, with unusual entrees and appetizers of which some can be requested veg or vegan. The fries are cooked separately from other fried food. The gravy on the poutine is vegetarian. Staff will answer questions about ingredients.
